Container.Name: Air Video HD
Container.Description: [h3]Air Video HD[/h3]Everything that was great about Air Video, re-thought and re-engineered to bring you the best and most reliable streaming video app for iOS devices.[br][br] See the configuration options in the server.properties file in your /config path. To find your server PIN, check the network.log file in /config/logs after the server has started.[br][br][b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is where the Air Video HD config file and logs will be.[br] [b]/conversionPath[/b] : if mapped, this is where temporary files will be kept by the transcoder.[br] [b]/videos[/b] : this is the default path for share1.[br]
